pivot_contrib.guretzki.bxmlbrowser
Class BXMLLoaderButton

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pivot.wtk.Component
      org.apache.pivot.wtk.Button
          org.apache.pivot.wtk.PushButton
              pivot_contrib.guretzki.bxmlbrowser.BXMLLoaderButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.pivot.wtk.ConstrainedVisual, org.apache.pivot.wtk.Visual
public class BXMLLoaderButton
extends org.apache.pivot.wtk.PushButton

PushButton that includes the capability to load any .bxml file containing a Component as root element

Optionally, this can be done using a temporary ClassLoader, so that changes to the classes during runtime get included. To do that, just use setChildClassLoaderURLs(URL[]).

Author:
Katharina Wegener and Thomas Guretzki
